alert.note: Alert for Citrus (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 28 at 11:45PM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of northern and west central Florida, including the following counties, in northern Florida, Levy. In west central Florida, Citrus. * WHEN...Until 145 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1145 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Inverness, Homosassa Springs, Beverly Hills, Crystal River Airport, Black Diamond, Homosassa, Inverness Highlands North, Hernando, Sugarmill Woods, Inglis, Citronelle, Pine Ridge, Crystal Manor, Crystal Oaks, Brent Wood, Citrus Springs, Lecanto, Green Acres, Citrus Hills and Leisure Acres. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
